title: Other persons required to make records
context: ยง338-22 Other persons required to make records. Persons in charge of institutions for care or correction or for treatment of disease, injury, or childbirth shall record and report all statistical data required by this part relating to their inmates or patients. [L 1949, c 327, ยง26; RL 1955, ยง57-25; HRS ยง338-22]
